text: nannalute natha! enre makkalil cilare, krsiyillatta i talvarayil, ninre adaraniya mandirattinatutt nan tamasippiccirikkunnu. nannalute natha! avar namaskaram nisthayeate nirvahikkananat. atinal ni janamanas'sukalil avareat atuppamuntakkename. avarkk aharamayi kaykanikal nalkename. avar nandi kaniccekkam
